response.overview: An interview between Jagadish, an assassin and Kabilan, a writer slowly unfolds and reaches a crescendo where the morals of the two men intertwine. Jagadish's body of work begins to inspire Kabilan to bring out the lost artist in him and his readers. While the humanitarian perspective which Kabilan shares has an impact on Jagadish, who begins seeking redemption through a life of morality built in his imagination.
response.title: Bayamariya Brammai
